analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0x33262f34eb8bd760706ede30c908cb1beb5aaf6c.sol:
	Contract GAToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x33262f34eb8bd760706ede30c908cb1beb5aaf6c.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

GAToken.constructor.totalSupply (local variable @ /unique_chucks/21/0x33262f34eb8bd760706ede30c908cb1beb5aaf6c.sol#438-440) shadows:
